phrases: Alright, let us end practice here.
You are a very happy camper, Komari-kun.
Let me give you a pat on the head.
I will call you Komarimax, then!
Speaking of which, can you call her Komari-chan yet, Rin?
It seems that the younger Natsume is quite shy.
You just have to read it.
When you try passing someone on a bicycle, you have to pedal a little bit harder, right?
Just put the same kind of effort into this.
I am not a former Giant!
Komari-san's smile was like the sun.
She probably does not think about him when she is outside.
About her brother, who only appears in her dreams.
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
hitori ga tsurai kara futatsu no te wo tsunaida
It was too hard for one to do, so two of us held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
futari ja samishii kara wa ni natte te wo tsunaida
But two would be too lonely, so we all came together in a circle and held hands
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
kitto sore ga ikusen no chikara ni mo nari
I am sure that will be strength in itself,
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
donna yume mo tateru ki ga surunda
Enough to end any dream we have
Fly high, high into the sky,
Fly high, high into the sky,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
takaku kere takaku koe wo age
Jump high, and raise your voice high,
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
itsuka kujiketa sono hi no mukou made
Until you can move on past the day we will have died
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kimi no koe wasurenai namida mo wasurenai
I will never forget your voice, and I will never forget your tears
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
kore kara hajimaru kibou to iu na no mirai wo
The future, what we call hope, begins now
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Those legs will keep on moving forward,
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
Even in the face of the oncoming grief
I had another dream about Onii-chan.
There were white flappy things blowing in the wind.
It was somewhere close to the sky, I think.
And when I woke up, his voice echoed in my ears.
He might be looking for me somewhere.
Maybe that is why he is calling me in my dreams.
Komari-san's brother might have been in a hospital.
It would be great if he were...
Riki, is there some way we can find him?
Oh, it is just you, kid?
You do not need to yell.
Who would not yell at a rude kid entering without permission?
Go back out and do it again.
Ask for permission with a loud, enthusiastic voice.
If you sound like a punk, even better.
I am here to see Kojirou-san!
I am just an old man trying to make the most of what little time he still has.
Do not take it too hard, kid.
You would not come here unless you wanted something.
I know it is not my place to ask,
but I would like to know about Komari-san's brother.
You know something about him right, Kojirou-san?
Komari-san often dreams about her brother.
If she really has a brother, and he is still alive, I want to look for him.
How much do you know, kid?
But I think her brother was in a hospital.
As for where he is now, it is probably exactly where you think.
Do me a favor and do not tell the girl.
If you really care about her, do not pry any deeper.
But why has not anyone told Komari-san
I told you not to pry.
I cannot tell you any more.
Consider what I have told you thanks for cleaning my room the other day.
Next time I come, I will not ask about this.
So Komari-san's brother really did pass away.
But why does not Komari-san remember anything about him,
and why has not anyone told her that he died?
That cannot be the only reason.
I am not Komari, but I am Komari,
but I am a different Komari...
Wait, maybe I should calm down first.
I thought I was going to be in trouble.
You did not fool me completely, though.
I am going to stay awake until morning with some crackers and chips.
There is a meteor shower tonight.
I think I can see it from my window too.
If you want to join me, we can watch it there!
Let us watch some shooting stars!
From somewhere close to the stars!
It is like the city is part of the stars in the sky!
It is something you can see anywhere,
but when you say that, it really does look like part of it.
When you see a shooting star, if you make a wish three times, it will come true.
It does not look like it is started yet.
I am not a very lucky person, so it is all up to your luck, Komari-san.
What should I wish on for a shooting star to fall?
No, it is just that we thought the same thing.
What should I wish on for a shooting star to fall?
Since we are already here, why do not we go somewhere higher?
If I go up first, you will see them.
And it is a bear today...
I-It is not that I like wearing kiddy panties!
I just happened to wear a bear today and a flower yesterday...
I wore grown-up ones the day before that...
What if I cover my eyes?
This will be the best place to see them.
They did not have any seaweed'n' salt ones, so I got some lightly salted ones.
Let us munch down on these while watching the shooting stars.
This will be my first time seeing a shooting star.
I was never even interested in seeing one before.
I think you are really good at finding things like this.
I think you can see more things than normal people can.
I think your eyes can see more than normal too, if you tried.
I think I have a wish.
Riki-kun, I wish your eyes could see just a little more than you do now.
Looks like you could see it.
What did you just wish for?
That all the Little Busters can be happy.
I wished for the same thing!
It is fun being together because that is everyone is happiness.
It is fun because there is so much happiness.
The sixth shooting star fell as Komari-san slept.
I wished that whatever secret there was, it would not be something sad.
The sun should be rising soon.
That might have been the last one.
I thought the seventh was the last one,
The story of the little match girl.
On New Year's Eve, the little match girl went to Heaven.
The girl's life disappeared along with the last shooting star.
Just like how my dream of Onii-chan disappears when I wake up.
Komari-san may have started to realize what happened to her brother.
This Saturday, would you, you know, maybe...
Would you go on a date with me?
I want to go somewhere kind of far to look for it.
Sorry, did I keep you waiting?
I have always wanted to say that.
It is what everyone says when they wait for someone.
Do they look weird on me?
I think they are just right.
To find what I have lost.
You know, I used to live around here.
But I do not remember it very well.
Even though I should have a lot of memories.
Forgetting things you do not want to and things you have to remember is really sad.
Komari-san came here to remember her brother.
Is that where her brother passed away?
Let us go on a boat!
Wow, look at all the fishies!
Her eyes were sad, as though she were looking for the bottom of her memories.
No matter how much her eyes were able to see,
she was unable to see it.
You really want to remember your brother, right?
Even when I lose something as tiny as a worn-out eraser,
I feel pretty down for a day or so.
That is why I am looking for them.
Do you really have to look for them?
Your brother is always in your dreams.
Can I sit next to you
We are back a bit later than planned.
And they said there was only a 20 chance of rain...
I do not like the rain.
A thunderstorm with a 20 chance of rain?!
I do not like scary things or spicy things...
Let us find a convenience store and get an umbrella.
Onii-chan, let us ride a boat when you get better, okay?
This was all just a dream.
The sound of the bell echoing,
The sound of the bell echoing,
Those pieces we shared, one each
Those pieces we shared, one each
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
I hope tomorrow will be sunny
Can we go beyond the stars?
Can we go beyond the stars?
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Walking, looking at the sky, a single light
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
Even alone, on the face of the moon,
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
rasen no hate he kaketeyuku yo
Run right past the end of the circle
You will be able to smile after you cry,
You will be able to smile after you cry,
I said that because I know you can
I said that because I know you can
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
bokura no tabi wasuretari shinai yo
You will never forget our journey, even for a moment
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
I will cast a little magic so you never lose it,
And I will not say good-bye
And I will not say good-bye
You will start walking again one day
You will start walking again one day
But that is really sad for Komari-chan!
